lead_paragraph: A former top adviser to Donald Trump's presidential campaign has signed on to work as a volunteer for a super political action committee backing his former boss — despite Trump's request that the group stand down.

headline.main: Former Trump Campaign Adviser Signs Onto Pro-Trump Super PAC
headline.print_headline: Former Trump Campaign Adviser Signs Onto Pro-Trump Super PAC

snippet: A former top adviser to Donald Trump's presidential campaign has signed on to work as a volunteer for a super political action committee backing his former boss — despite Trump's request that the group stand down....
